nanopb module usage guide.
Brief:           This module is 3rd party open source and is a plain-C implementation of Google's Protocol Buffers data format.
Usage:           GCC:  1) In your GCC project Makefile, please add the following:
                          include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/third_party/nanopb/module.mk
                       2) Add the following to include paths:
                          middleware/third_party/nanopb/inc
Dependency:      N/A
Notice:          N/A
Relative doc:    For more information, please refer to https://jpa.kapsi.fi/nanopb
Example project: Please find the earbuds_ref_design project under the project folder.
